body.p:
Springfield Ky Feby 24/64
To his Excellency Thos E Bramlette
Governor of Ky --
A vacancy has occurred in District No 3 in this (Washington) County by the resgination of Joshua Smalley Justice of the Peace for said district --
I enclose a petition signed by a number of citizens of said district recommending Samuel B Montgomery as a person suitable to fill said vacancy --
S B Montgomery served in that capacity for several years and I think would fill the office better than almost any once else living in the district --

Respectfully
John McIntire
Presiding Judge W. C. C

Washington Co
J. P.
Appointed
7th Mar 1864
